lead_paragraph: The world has made strides in advancing equality for women, but the pace of change remains too slow in many areas, Hillary Clinton said, pressing the need to improve girls' education.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Rallies for Girls in School, Women in Office
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Rallies for Girls in School, Women in Office
